content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the apartment is truly a gem, located in the city center, close to all important facilities. Now, about the rental price, I was thinking something around 1500 euros per month.

content: That sounds like a fair starting point. Could you perhaps give me a little more information about the amenities and furnishings of the apartment?

content: I understand that you're offering a new and unfurnished apartment, which is an attractive proposition. content: Of course, but let me first clarify the rental price. I'm not willing to go below 1350 euros per month. name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the additional information. The location is indeed a significant advantage, and the inclusion of water and heating in the rent is quite appealing. Could you perhaps consider a slightly lower price point, considering that the apartment is unfurnished and I would need to invest in furniture?

content: I understand your concern, but I must clarify the rental price again. I'm not willing to go below 1300 euros per month. name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your dedication to providing a good living experience is commendable, and the location and amenities do indeed have great value. name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I must clarify the rental price one last time. I'm not willing to go below 1300 euros per month. The location and amenities of this apartment are truly exceptional, and I believe this price is more than fair for the value you'll be receiving.
